General.Name: Flotek Industries Inc
General.Description: Flotek Industries, Inc. operates as a technology-driven green chemistry and data company that serves customers across industrial and commercial markets in the United States, the United Arab Emirates, and internationally. It operates through two segments: Chemistry Technologies (CT) and Data Analytics (DA). The CT segment designs, develops, manufactures, packages, and distributes green specialty chemicals that enhance the profitability of hydrocarbon producers, as well as specialty chemistries, and logistics and technology services. This segment primarily serves integrated oil and gas, oilfield services, independent oil and gas, national and state-owned oil, geothermal energy, solar energy, and alternative energy companies. The DA segment provides analytical measurement solutions to deliver real-time information and insights to enable optimization of operations and reduction of emissions and their carbon intensity. It sells its products directly through a mix of in-house sales professionals, as well as contractual agency agreements. Flotek Industries, Inc. was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 5775 North Sam Houston Parkway West, Houston, TX, United States, 77086
